Package renderer

Class SimpleRayTracer

java.lang.Object
renderer.RayTracerBase
renderer.SimpleRayTracer
public class SimpleRayTracer extends RayTracerBase
A simple implementation of a ray tracer. This class extends the RayTracerBase and provides a basic ray tracing algorithm.

  • Method Details

    • traceRay

      public Color traceRay (Ray ray)
      Description copied from class: RayTracerBase
      Traces a ray and determines the color at the intersection point. This method should be overridden by subclasses to provide specific ray tracing behavior.
      Overrides:
      traceRay in class RayTracerBase
      Parameters:
      ray - the ray to be traced
      Returns:
      the color at the intersection point, or black if no intersection
